description: Medic UI Dashboard - Web-based administrative interface for managing services, heartbeats, alerts, and playbooks

userStories.title: Create React project with Vite and TypeScript
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the React project scaffolded with Vite and TypeScript so we have a foundation to build upon.
acceptanceCriteria: Create ui/ directory with Vite + React + TypeScript
Add basic App.tsx with 'Medic UI' heading
npm run dev starts development server
npm run build produces production files
userStories.notes: Completed in SRE-59. Updated App.tsx heading to 'Medic UI'.

userStories.title: Configure ESLint, Prettier, and code quality tools
userStories.description: As a developer, I need code quality tools configured for consistent code style.
acceptanceCriteria: Install and configure ESLint with TypeScript support
userStories.notes: Completed in prior work. Using eslint.config.js (ESLint 9 flat config) instead of legacy .eslintrc.js.

userStories.title: Create Docker configuration for UI
userStories.description: As a developer, I need Docker configuration so the UI can be containerized.
acceptanceCriteria: Create ui/Dockerfile with multi-stage build (Node build to nginx serve)
Update docker-compose.yml to include ui service
nginx routes /api/* to medic-api, /* to static React files
docker-compose up builds and runs UI service
userStories.notes: Completed in prior work. docker-compose.yml already includes ui service.

userStories.title: Install and configure Tailwind CSS
userStories.description: As a developer, I need Tailwind CSS configured for styling the UI.

userStories.title: Configure Linq brand color palette in Tailwind
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the Linq brand colors configured in Tailwind for consistent styling.
acceptanceCriteria: Add Linq brand colors to tailwind.config.js: black (#141414), cream (#FCF9E9), sage (#B0BFB7), linq-blue (#4F9FDF), navy (#1B3D67), linq-green (#83B149), lime (#E8DF6E)
Add status colors: healthy (#83B149), warning (#CA8A04/#EAB308), error (#DC2626/#EF4444), critical (#991B1B/#DC2626), muted (#6B7280/#9CA3AF)
Colors accessible via Tailwind classes (e.g., bg-linq-green, text-navy)

userStories.title: Install Geist font family
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the Geist font family installed for brand-compliant typography.
acceptanceCriteria: Configure Tailwind to use Geist for sans font family
Configure Tailwind to use Geist Mono for mono font family
userStories.notes: Completed in SRE-60. Geist variable fonts copied to public/fonts/ for Vite compatibility.

userStories.title: Install shadcn/ui and base components
userStories.description: As a developer, I need shadcn/ui installed as the component library foundation.
acceptanceCriteria: Initialize shadcn/ui with npx shadcn-ui@latest init
Install Button component via shadcn/ui CLI
Install Card component via shadcn/ui CLI
userStories.notes: Completed in SRE-86. shadcn/ui initialized with Button and Card components. CSS variables configured for Linq brand colors. Path aliases set up for @/* imports.

userStories.title: Create theme provider with dark mode support
userStories.description: As a user, I want to toggle between light and dark themes.
acceptanceCriteria: Create ThemeProvider component using React context
Support light, dark, and system themes
Dark mode uses Linq dark colors (cream background in dark mode is #141414)
Add theme toggle button in App.tsx
userStories.notes: Completed in SRE-60. ThemeProvider with React context, light/dark/system themes, localStorage persistence, and ThemeToggle component with sun/moon icons.

userStories.title: Install React Router and create basic routes
userStories.description: As a developer, I need routing configured for multi-page navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: Create placeholder pages: Dashboard, Services, Alerts, Playbooks, AuditLogs, Settings
userStories.notes: Completed in SRE-87. Installed react-router-dom v6, created src/pages/ with placeholder pages, configured BrowserRouter and routes with navigation header.

userStories.title: Create sidebar navigation component
userStories.description: As a user, I want a sidebar navigation to move between sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Create Sidebar component with navigation links
Links: Dashboard, Services, Alerts, Playbooks, Audit Logs, Settings
Use Lucide icons for each nav item

userStories.title: Create header component with branding
userStories.description: As a user, I want a header showing the Medic logo and theme toggle.

userStories.title: Create main layout with sidebar and header
userStories.description: As a user, I want a consistent layout across all pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Create Layout component that combines Header, Sidebar, and content area
Content area renders child routes via Outlet
Layout is responsive (sidebar collapses on mobile)
Add hamburger menu for mobile navigation

userStories.title: Create API client module with TypeScript types

acceptanceCriteria: Create AuthContext with isAuthenticated, apiKey, login, logout
Store API key in sessionStorage (not localStorage)
API client uses apiKey from context

userStories.title: Create login page for API key entry

acceptanceCriteria: Create Login page with API key input field
Validate API key by making test request to /health
Show error message for invalid keys
Redirect to Dashboard on successful login

userStories.title: Add protected route wrapper
userStories.description: As a developer, I need unauthenticated users redirected to login.
acceptanceCriteria: Wrap all routes except /login in ProtectedRoute

userStories.title: Install React Query for server state
